lead_paragraph: Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom has hired Allen Ruby, a trial lawyer known for his work on commercial and intellectual property cases as well as white-collar criminal trials. Mr. Ruby is to work as a litigation partner in Skadden's office in Palo Alto, Calif.
snippet: Skadden, Arps, Slate Meagher & Flom has hired Allen Ruby, a trial lawyer known for his work on commercial and intellectual property cases as well as white-collar criminal trials.
